channel.title: Homepage title on Kira Olsen, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage title on Kira Olsen, Ph.D.

item.title: Hi there!
item.description: I’m a data scientist with a background in climate science, geophysics, and machine learning.

item.title: LSTM for time-series forecasting: predicting wind-power generation
item.description: Time-series forecasting has tons of applications. If we have a record of how something has changed with time in the past, the next step is often to wonder about how the same variable will change in the future.

item.title: A convolutional neural network built to detect Antarctic icequakes
item.description: Just as earthquakes routinely shake the earth in California or Alaska, icequakes occur when ice fractures or shifts within the ice caps at the poles of our planet.
